TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It works when you have named the craft Lance-a-Lot.

I wish for a bird thundering.

here is a thunderbird (one of the ksp stock sph default crafts) thundering towards you at 1km/s.

I wish for thunder (bird sold separately)

@Space Kerbalisation Tech was killed by Thor. 

I wish no thunderbirds.

Granted. You don't have thunderbirds.

I wish the Robocop combat tactics was not that stupid.

Granted. But it has many bugs. 

I wish a arc reactor.

Granted. You build an ark and react.

I wish for a landscape 3d photocamera.

Granted: You have a landscape painting of a 3D photocamera.

I wish that @Abel101126 learns when to put AN rather than A.

Grannted. Now he puts AN insteand of A in anny word.

I wish, he was also writing "the"[e] before consonants, but "the"i before the vowels.

Edited April 11, 2022 by kerbiloid

Nah. 

I wish I can play KSP in a cool style.

Granted. You started waiting for winter.

I wish my desktop was not so dusty.

Granted. Your desktop was dirty. 

I wish my desktop wasn't messy.

Granted: Now it is so tidy that you can't find anything.

I wish for better reference pics.

Granted, the reference were full of profanity, and you start being hated.

I wish to go back to where I went on vacation 

Spoiler

It was so cold in there that it was a getaway to the hot cities. Not water-freezing cold, just at least 13 degrees Celsius

Granted. You bought a fridge.

I wish for a toy Moon in natural size.

Granted: Ken is mooning you.

I wish to finish the internal after having got distracted and building a Cyber Quad Bike.

Granted. But I hack into your computer and destroy it. 

I wish I can have F5 and F9 in real life.

Granted. These are the only buttons left on your keyboard.

I wish for a new old style keyboard without highlight, like I'm using now.

Granted. You got a 1910 style keyboard. 

I wish world peace.

Granted. However, only you can make it happen.

I wish smokey bear started forest fires.

Granted: He replaces the main character in Stephen King's book Fire Starter and Drew Barrymore never does any movies after being in E.T the Extraterrestrial.

I wish Ray Bradbury had written 232.78 Celsius.

Granted. He use the language that you don't know 

I wish the whole forum is written in Chinese.

Granted. And the KSP binary code is replaced with hieroglyphs, too. Try to run it.

I wish, CPU had 3d instructions.

Granted. It's Lego now. Try applying thermal paste to a 2 x 3 x 2 plastic brick...

I wish that Jeremy Clarkson, James May and Richard Hammond presented Top Gear still.

Granted: Jeremy got anger management lessons years before punching any Producers, he became civil and polite and never did anything stupidly entertaining.

I wish the Kal 1000 understood how I work.

Granted. You realize that your mind is a KAL 1000 script.

I wish for a full comprehensive kOS guide.
